Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 23 Sanidassanasappaṭighattika » 23.7 Pañhāvāra » 23.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 23.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Jhānādi
Sanidassanasappaṭighattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Jhānādi
48.
3042Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo…  maggapaccayena paccayo…  sampayuttapaccayena paccayo—  anidassanaappaṭigho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ sampayuttapaccayena paccayo…pe…  dve khandhā…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… .
<< Indriyaup Vippayutta >>
